mapper.select: SELECT A.ID AS ID, A.DATA_ACCESS_APP_ID AS DATA_ACCESS_APP_ID, A.IP AS IP, B.DATA_ACCESS_APP_NAME AS DATA_ACCESS_APP_NAME, A.UPDATE_TIME AS UPDATE_TIME, A.CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME FROM DW_OPEN_WHITE_LIST AS A INNER JOIN DW_OPEN_APP_ACCESS AS B ON A.DATA_ACCESS_APP_ID = B.DATA_ACCESS_APP_ID AND A.DATA_ACCESS_APP_ID = #{accessAppId}
SELECT IP FROM DW_OPEN_WHITE_LIST WHERE DATA_ACCESS_APP_ID in ( SELECT DATA_ACCESS_APP_ID FROM DW_OPEN_APP_ACCESS WHERE DATA_ACCESS_KEY = #{appKey} )
